title: Without breaking ciphers: [0.48+ LB]
description: This is a quite fast solution working only on the encrypted text, without the use of brute force. It is possible to get this way 0.48+ LB  As it is shown in this kernel, it would be also possible to identify the delimiters used (at least for difficulty 1 and 2), even without decryting the full text. With that knowledge it would be possible to get even a better result without seeing the plain texts or using brute force.
description_lemmatized: quite fast solution working encrypted text without use brute force possible get way 048 lb shown kernel would also possible identify delimiters used least difficulty 1 2 even without decryting full text knowledge would possible get even better result without seeing plain text using brute force
